channel.title: Designs on Darius Wieczorek DEL-ART
channel.description: Recent content in Designs on Darius Wieczorek DEL-ART

item.title: Promotional materials
item.description:
Low-budget projects implemented for the needs of current and annual events. Usually prepared on the basis of provided amateur-quality photographs and low-resolution references of sponsors' corporate materials.

Promotional materials' graphic design for public events includes: posters, flyers, invitations, press ads, tickets, event programs, social media banners, and any advertisement that may be applicable.

item.title: Flagship Gallery Marketing Collaterals
item.description: Flagship Gallery uses visual content in print and digital media… The gallery hosts recurring monthly events, for which I have developed digital and physical content; published on the gallery’s website, social media accounts, as well as on printed posters and flyers.

item.title: Logo design
item.description: Gallery X logo is actually refining of the originally proposed design. The alternative developments are included in the final proposition as subtle polishes, rectified character, and hints and motions of additional meaning.

item.title: Presentation's Backgrounds and Elements
item.description: PowerPoint is a leading presentation tool for most companies. It is great when it is used like any other marketing tool according to branding developed for the business.

item.title: Social Media
item.description:
The ever-evolving social media domain is an important means of promotion and publicity.

Banners designed for various Social Media. Advertising materials developed for simultaneous use on many platforms in promoting current events.

item.title: Web Icons design
item.description: Projects executed for Cabbagetown Regent Park Community Museum were the opportunity to exercise publishing works in many media. One of the projects was renewing and updating the museum’s website.

item.title: Website Design
item.description: Website designed and developed for the online store. All visuals for the WordPress, WooCommerce site are created from scratch.

item.title: Zrodlo - Polish Folk Song and Dance Ensemble
item.description: The set of promotional materials including flyers, invitations, posters, banners, tickets for the anniversary Gala. Flyers were designed as double language in a double-sided layout. The designing work was followed by print supervision in the offset print shop where the large-volume print of flyers and invitations was performed.
